item.title: Echospace : for brass quintet or brass choir and tape, [op. 23]

item.note: "May be performed by a brass quintet or by a brass choir composed of any number and combination of trumpets (or cornets), French horns, trombones, baritones, and tubas ad lib." Parts for 2 treble instruments in B♭, 1 treble instrument in F, 2 bass instruments in C.
